title: 529 - The Chutzpah of Public Sector Leadership
itunes:title: 529 - The Chutzpah of Public Sector Leadership
description: It’s a difficult time for public sector workers—health departments, social workers, sanitation staff, and more are burned out from doing so much with so little during an intense pandemic. Beth Blauer, associate vice provost for public sector innovation at Johns Hopkins, talks with Josh Sharfstein about contributing factors to the burnout, where there is innovation happening, and ways for public officials to embrace “the chutzpah of leadership.”
